remarks: The successor value resulting from finite recursive definition generation (special case where the generation function is expressed in maps-to notation), using double-substitution instead of a bound variable condition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
frsucmpt2.1 $e |- F = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) |` _om ) $.
frsucmpt2.2 $e |- ( y = x -> E = C ) $.
frsucmpt2.3 $e |- ( y = ( F ` B ) -> E = D ) $.
frsucmpt2 $p |- ( ( B e. _om /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B y $.
$d C y $.
$d D y $.
$d E x $.
